descriptionHtml:
KarliahArmor 


release date : January 2012
Category: Armor
Mod version : !.0
Author: Hentai


Description
===========
Karliah Armor
You can create this armor with leather and leather strips


Install
=======
Extract the archive. Take the folders \"meshes\", \"textures\" and paste them in your Skyrim/Data folder. 


Uninstall
=========
Delete Folder
Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\armor\\HentaiKarliahArmor\\f
Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\Hentai\\Shadow


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.
Caliente for Caliente\'s Body Mod - Big Bottom Edition v3.0
miklou (Created Esp file) is an angel
nkyhiro(Naru) for always willing helping me


Tools Used
==========
Blender
NIFSkope
Photoshop
CrazyBump


Permissions
==========
1.  Feel free to use everything in this file.

2.  Everything I made for Obliviion is free to convert to Skyrim. Since Im not going to convert them myself.
author: Hentai
